docs.text: near the end of frank capra's holiday classic , its a wonderful life , george bailey ( jimmy stewart ) is feeling down .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has devoted his life to others , and never fulfilled his dream of leaving his small supburb town , bedford falls .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: standing upon a bridge above stormy waters , he looks down , contemplating suicide .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has potential he hasn't fulfilled -- yet , he has done so much for others .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as a young chap , his ambition was to leave his hometown of bedford falls .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but times and ambitions change .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: things happen , and he's stuck .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his guardian angel is there , and shows him that . . . it's
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a wonderful life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in a whirlwind tour of the town , george sees what life would be like without him .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he learns the moral lesson , that to live is a gift .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his earthly problems are solved .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the climatic scene is a marvel .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: frank capra's film is a centenial classic -- watched and re-experienced by every generation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: wonderful life is one of the few pictures of times gone by that seems as fresh , maybe fresher , then it did when it was first released .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: many films of the thirties through seventies have aged poorly .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but this one is a near flawless example of how well a perfect script and timing can mesh with first-rate acting , wit and suspense , glorious music , and terrific set peices .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the only even slightly dated scenes are those at the begining in which god has a long chat with clarence , george's guardian angel .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they aren't all that bad , but they remain corny and a little out of place .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: nevertheless , this is one film that deserves its place in time , cinema history , and our hearts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it can be equally appreciated by anyone of any age .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: here is one genuine masterpeice , a classic that reaches heights and ambitions near perfection .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this crackling good mixture results in a film which is at once funny , exciting , moving and uplifting .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the film itself is almost a reversal of the life of george bailey -- there isn't too much to it , but capra and the gang ( various screenwriters , composers , actors ) plumet the material to its fullest potential .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the result is a film -- though not at first intended to be pigeon-holed as a holiday film -- that will always be remembered , celebrated , and loved .
docs.label: positive
